name: World Mender
description:
A world where everything has been shattered into bits. Use your spaceship to reclaim the planet's pieces and rebuild your home.

Made by team Eshta (Omar Khalil)

3D tiles and models by Kay Lousberg: https://kaylousberg.itch.io/

Spaceship by Kenney: http://kenney.nl/

Music by John Easton:  https://youtu.be/HKinw3NqWFQ
